nodes.text: This female individual was the mother of Landonis Balthazar Calrissian. Calrissian considered her to be the "most amazing woman" he had ever known. Calrissian owned an aurodium ring with his mother's name inscribed in it.
Landonis Balthazar Calrissian's mother was first mentioned in the 2018 Star Wars Anthology film Solo: A Star Wars Story.
